r.d: A binding to the Syck library. YAML(tm) (rhymes with "camel") is a straightforward machine parsable data serialization format designed for human readability and interaction with scripting languages. YAML is optimized for data serialization, configuration settings, log files, Internet messaging and filtering.
r.n: - fixed bug#31 (broken yaml caused segfault) - multiline strings are exported in folded format (for readability) now - maps and sequences of unknown types are treated as php/hash and php/array (with notice)
